changelog: # fixed:
- fixed crashing due to lua function call recursion in `blue fire` helper-call
- changed the hints into a diamond shape and moved them down right next to the actual location square
- fixed some locations being in the wrong spots
- added some descriptive images to some sanity settings to make them easier so read at a glance
- restructure the settings popup window.....not final and i'm happy to hear suggestions
- (splitting and disabling the auto settings fill will come in a bit)
- fixed filling of some settings causing errors
## added but not working:
- added an autofill for dungeon rewards being mapped to the dungeons they got shuffled into. 0.6.1 AP main Webhost does not expose that as of now.
fixed
- fixed multiple child-only locations being shown as accessible for adult with not child access.
- keyrings should now be handled correctly as in getting the keyring should set the keyount to its max.
- added MQ locations and placed them correct on the map (Thanks Superfid2006), they still have no logic
- hints now reset on reconnect instead of needing to do it manually
- fixed issue with hiding locations depending on settings
- always show GT boss key chest instead of hiding it when GT Bosskey is removed since there is still an item shuffled in there.
known issues
- locations where you have to be there first as Child and then clear the way for Adult have problems because the age-swap occurs too soon in the logic so that not every location is checked for Child.
- ocarina+warp songs falsely give child access
-hint overshadowing the locations below it and thus not being able to see all the unhinted locations accessibility
whats next:
- add MQ logic
- fixing child<>adult interactions between the same location
- fix order of operations for moving through the locations. this should move the age swap at the end of the current age
fix logic not updateing after connect
add handling for closed forest forcing startingage to child
activates all maps and compass when selecting 'start with'
fixes wrong GTG rule to show/hide non-/MQ depending on setting
